titleStmt.title: The third part of the Countesse of Pembrokes Yuychurch Entituled, Amintas dale. Wherein are the most conceited tales of the pagan gods in English hexameters together with their auncient descriptions and philosophicall explications. By Abraham Fraunce.
Countesse of Pembrokes Yuychurch. Part 3
titleStmt.author: Fraunce, Abraham, fl. 1587-1633.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Thomas Orwyn], for Thomas Woodcocke, dwelling in Paules Church-yeard, at the signe of the blacke Beare,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
